meanings.definition: A type of cell junction that connects adjacent cells in tissues
meanings.sent1: The desmosomes between the cells help them stick together.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how desmosomes work to keep cells connected.
meanings.sent3: The desmosomes had a party and invited all the neighboring cells.
meanings.sent4: The desmosomes acted like tiny bridges between the cells.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a model to demonstrate how desmosomes function in tissues.

meanings.definition: Structures that provide mechanical strength to tissues by anchoring cells together
meanings.sent1: The desmosomes play a crucial role in holding tissues together.
meanings.sent2: Doctors examine the desmosomes to understand tissue strength.
meanings.sent3: The desmosomes decided to have a tug-of-war competition to show their strength.
meanings.sent4: The desmosomes were like strong glue keeping the cells in place.
meanings.sent5: The construction workers compared the desmosomes to sturdy ropes holding everything in place.
